name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: APM Music Audio & Video Editor By MatchTune

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically and quickly auto-edit and preview your music tracks.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Instantly resize any song to your exact desired duration with the custom TuneBlades plugin for APM Music.

Songs are rarely the length you are looking for. Adapting them for different durations often requires re-editing the whole song, which can easily become a time-intensive, budget-draining process.

With our AI-powered, custom TuneBlades plugin for APM, you can automatically generate shorter or longer edits of a song to fit your needs, while preserving tempo, melody fundamentals & vocal integrity.
